message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I think the initial price is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $900,000 is a strong offer, I'm aiming for something closer to $1,100,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
